name: Skelly Squad
description:
Fight endless waves of undead skellies with your trusty blade and infinite flares. DO NOT let them get together, or else they will become much more tough (somehow).

With 3 different maps, each requiring different strategies to survive in, you will have lots of fun slashing through skellies.

Control with a keyboard and mouse, using the WASD or direction keys, left and right click, and escape for pausing.

This is made for the Brackeys game jam in unity. Had a different idea than this but discarded it halfway through so haaaaaaa~.

Thanks to VGComposer for the music, Tiny Worlds for the in-game font, and you for checking out the page!

Also an intro screen glitch where the player character stretches while moving.
